content: I have a profile that uses an extension I've defined (both in the same IG), and it builds fine, but the generated pages don't seem to have the right URLs? The profile is here, and the description has a link to the extension http://build.fhir.org/ig/cqframework/hedis-ig/StructureDefinition/hedis-libraryartifactComment.html, but based on what's actually output in the IG, the url _should_ be: http://build.fhir.org/ig/cqframework/hedis-ig/StructureDefinition-hedis-libraryartifactComment.html (notice the - between StructureDefinition and hedis, instead of a /).
Is this something I'm doing wrong in the IG definitions somewhere? Anyone else seen this? It's also happening with ValueSets and CodeSystems in the output.
That'll be driven by a template in your IG framework. You'll have to fix the template
which framework are you using mine or lloyds?
Ultimately, it's based on the original IG template from the build tooling.
So I don't know whether that's closer to yours or Lloyd's.
